descriptionHtml:
[size=3]Author: GovnoWriter [/size]
[size=3]Language: English [/size]
[size=3]Version: 1.0                                [/size][color=#ffff00][size=4]  Always before installing a new mod make a spare save game[/size][/color]
[color=#ffff00][size=4]
[/size][/color][size=3]Description: This mod adds respawn all NPCs besides companions and Alduin. [/size]
[size=3] Dead NPCs in order to search them again. [/size]
[size=3]Live in order to Rob them again. [/size]
[size=3]Enemies in order to win new victories. [/size]
[size=3] In the original, many of the enemies should not respawn. [/size]
[size=3] This I was very disappointed.[/size]

[size=3]Installation: Copy all files from archive in the data folder[/size]
author: GovnoWriter
